commandList.name: config
commandList.description: Set the channel where the amount of :eyes: emotes will be sent.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to send the messages to.

commandList.name: stats
commandList.description: Get the amount of eyes emojis sent globally, in this server, and individually.

options.name: in
options.description: Should I get global, server, or individual stats?

options.name: global
options.description: All eyes emojis sent across all servers.

options.name: server
options.description: Just the eyes emojis for this server.

options.name: individual
options.description: Eyes sent by you or another person.

options.name: user
options.description: The person to check (leave blank for yourself)

commandList.name: invite
commandList.description: Get an invite link for the bot.

commandList.name: disable
commandList.description: Disable the tracking channel set up in /config

commandList.name: time
commandList.description: Get the next time for the day/week resets
